00062   TMS_Data::ListProgression*
00063   list() {
00064     
00065     //To check the sessionKey
00066     msessionServer.check();
00067 
00068     std::vector<std::string> results;
00069     std::vector<std::string>::iterator  iter;
00070     std::string batchJobId;
00071     int status;
00072     long startTime;
00073     long walltime;
00074 
00075     std::string acLogin = UserServer(msessionServer).getUserAccountLogin(mmachineId);
00076 
00077     TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = TMS_Data::TMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00078     mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createListProgression();
00079 
00080     std::string sqlRequest = "SELECT jobId, jobName, wallClockLimit, endDate, status, batchJobId from vsession, job where"
00081             " vsession.numsessionid=job.vsession_numsessionid and submitMachineId='"+mmachineId+"'";
00082 
00083     if(mparameters->getJobId().size()!=0) {
00084       std::string jobId = mparameters->getJobId();
00085       sqlRequest.append(" and jobId='"+jobId+"'");
00086       boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> sqlResult(ServerTMS::getInstance()->getDatabaseVishnu()->getResult(sqlRequest.c_str()));
00087       if(sqlResult->getNbTuples() == 0) {
00088         throw TMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_JOBID);        
00089       }
00090     } else {
00091       if(mparameters->getJobOwner().size()!=0) {
00092         acLogin = mparameters->getJobOwner(); 
00093       }
00094       sqlRequest.append(" and owner='"+acLogin+"'");
00095     }
00096 
00097     sqlRequest.append("  and status < 5 order by jobId");
00098     
00099     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> sqlResult(ServerTMS::getInstance()->getDatabaseVishnu()->getResult(sqlRequest.c_str()));
00100 
00101     if (sqlResult->getNbTuples() != 0){
00102       for (size_t i = 0; i < sqlResult->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00103 
00104         results.clear();
00105         results = sqlResult->get(i);
00106         iter = results.begin();
00107 
00108         TMS_Data::Progression_ptr job = ecoreFactory->createProgression();
00109 
00110         job->setJobId(*iter);
00111         job->setJobName(*(++iter));
00112         walltime = convertToInt(*(++iter));
00113         job->setWallTime(walltime);
00114         job->setEndTime(convertToTimeType(*(++iter)));
00115         status = convertToInt(*(++iter));
00116         job->setStatus(status);
00117         batchJobId = *(++iter);    
00118 
00119         BatchFactory factory;
00120         BatchType batchType  = ServerTMS::getInstance()->getBatchType(); 
00121         boost::scoped_ptr<BatchServer> batchServer(factory.getBatchServerInstance(batchType));
00122 
00123         startTime = batchServer->getJobStartTime(batchJobId); 
00124         if(startTime!=0) {
00125           job->setStartTime(startTime);
00126 
00127           if(status==5) {
00128             job->setPercent(100);  
00129           } else {
00130             time_t currentTime = vishnu::getCurrentTimeInUTC();
00131             int percent = 0;
00132             time_t gap = currentTime-startTime;
00133             if(walltime==0) {
00134                walltime = 60;
00135             }
00136 
00137             if(gap < walltime) {
00138               double ratio =  100*(double(gap)/walltime);
00139               if(ratio > 0.0 && ratio <= 1.0) {
00140                 percent = 1;
00141               } else {
00142                 percent = static_cast<int>(ratio);
00143               }
00144             } else {
00145               percent = 99;
00146             }
00147             job->setPercent(percent);
00148           } 
00149         } else {
00150           job->setPercent(0);
00151         }
00152         mlistObject->getProgress().push_back(job); 
00153       }
00154     }
00155     
00156     mlistObject->setNbJobs(mlistObject->getProgress().size());
00157    
00158     return mlistObject;
00159 
00160   }
